title: "GitHub Project Collab policekillings"
output: 
  html_document: 
    keep_md: yes
---

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(GGally)
library(moderndive)
library(infer)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
```

(@) Brief overview of the data set *police_killings*, *raceethnicity* filled by *gender*. 

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
police_killings %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_bar(aes(x=raceethnicity, fill=gender), position="dodge")
```

\

(@) Density plot for *p_income* (tract-level median personal income) and *raceethnicity*. This plot shows 

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(data=police_killings) + 
  geom_density_ridges(aes(x=p_income, y=raceethnicity, fill=raceethnicity), alpha=0.25)
```

\

(@) Bar plot of *armed*, how/whether deceased was armed
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(data=police_killings)+
  geom_bar(aes(x=armed), fill="lightblue")
```
